forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers late. Low 1C.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of snow showers overnight. Lows overnight in the mid 30s.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers mixed late. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 33F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of light snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with some light snow. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
